targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM mava_tickets_with_customers WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM mava_tickets_with_customers WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM mava_tickets_with_customers WHERE status = 'Waiting';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM mava_tickets_with_customers WHERE status = 'Resolved';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_mava_tickets_with_customers FROM mava_tickets_with_customers;
SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM mava_tickets_with_customers GROUP BY status ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM mava_tickets_with_customers GROUP BY status ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT date_trunc('day', created_at) AS time, COUNT(*) AS count FROM mava_tickets_with_customers WHERE created_at IS NOT NULL GROUP BY time ORDER BY time;

SELECT ROUND(AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (updated_at - created_at))/3600), 2) AS avg_resolution_hours FROM mava_tickets_with_customers WHERE status = 'Resolved' AND created_at IS NOT NULL AND updated_at IS NOT NULL;
SELECT priority, COUNT(*) AS count FROM mava_tickets_with_customers GROUP BY priority ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS count FROM mava_tickets_with_customers GROUP BY category ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT CASE WHEN status = 'Resolved' THEN 'Closed' ELSE 'Open' END AS state, COUNT(*) AS count FROM mava_tickets_with_customers GROUP BY state;

panels.title: Most Common Words in Support Tickets

targets.rawSql: WITH words AS (SELECT unnest(string_to_array(lower(regexp_replace(content, '[^a-zA-Z0-9\s]', '', 'g')), ' ')) AS word FROM mava_messages WHERE content IS NOT NULL AND content <> '' AND LENGTH(content) > 3), filtered_words AS (SELECT word FROM words WHERE LENGTH(word) > 3 AND word NOT IN ('this', 'that', 'with', 'have', 'will', 'from', 'they', 'been', 'were', 'said', 'each', 'which', 'their', 'what', 'about', 'would', 'there', 'could', 'more', 'very', 'than', 'just', 'like', 'only', 'into', 'over', 'also', 'back', 'after', 'use', 'two', 'how', 'our', 'work', 'first', 'well', 'way', 'even', 'new', 'want', 'because', 'any', 'these', 'give', 'day', 'most', 'us', 'hello', 'thanks', 'please')) SELECT word AS "Word", COUNT(*) AS "Frequency" FROM filtered_words GROUP BY word ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 20;
